946547730054234118.text: *stretches arms* *cracks knuckles* Mr. President, buckle up for a SIMPLE science lesson... A WARMING arctic actually fuels these cold snaps. Because the Arctic is experiencing warming, there is LESS ice which allows more heat to escape from the ocean. Cont.....https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/946531657229701120 …

946547732193230848.text: The energy released from the ocean weakens polar vortex winds over the Arctic, which keeps the chilly weather there. The weakening allows cold polar air to escape southward more often. This explains the temperature lows in certain regions. Cont...

946547733392793601.text: So, NO, we don’t need a “good dose of global warming” or however your scientifically illiterate ass tweeted your FAKE NEWS. Take a seat, in your Oval Office and learn some facts. Your 100+ vacation days say you need to do that more often.
